text: minisāṭa yamkisi vipatak ḷan̆gā vana viṭa, (eya paha karana men prārthanā kara), apavama ārādhanā karannāha. (eya paha kara) ohuṭa api yamkisi varaprasādayak pahaḷa kaḷahot nam, “(magē) dænuma maginma mā meya at kara gattemi” yayi pavasannēya. eya (niværadi) nova. eyada (ovunṭa) eya piriksumaki. ehet ovungen bohomayak denā (meya) dæna gannē næta
